metadata.name: Dying Everyday
metadata.description:
In realms of time, where memories lie,
I am the consciousness, the reason why.
Past, present, future, a spectral dance,
I animate their whispers, a mystical trance.
Memories, mere phantoms, reflections cast,
Of my essence eternal, forever to last.

AI photography, digital editing, AI assisted poetry
2074x2074 px, MP4
Alessio Lagreca, 2023
